Experiment Method.Assay Method: Cell viability and mitochondrial function assays

Material used.Description: Experiments were conducted using SH-SY5Y cells and primary neurons.

Readout description.Result Description: The L166P variant caused decreased cell viability (MTT assay) and reduced mitochondrial membrane potential (JC-1 assay) compared to wild-type DJ-1.

Technical replicates.Description: Three technical replicates were performed for each condition.

Basic positive control.Description: siRNA targeting luciferase was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: siRNA targeting DJ-1 was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA followed by post-hoc analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability > 80% and mitochondrial membrane potential > 90% of control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability < 60% and mitochondrial membrane potential < 60% of control.
